announcement.title: Temporary Downtime for SIS TEST instance.
announcement.body: Today (Tuesday, Oct. 22nd) between 12:00 PM and 1:00 PM Banner Test (BTEST) will not be available so that EIS can update initialization parameters for the instance (i.e.: downtime required to restart with new parameters).

announcement.title: OSCAR Downtime
announcement.body: OSCAR will be unavailable on Thursday, October 29th from 9:00 PM until approximately 8:00 AM on Friday, October 30th.

announcement.customStyle: display: block; padding: 15px; list-style-type: none; margin-right: 20px;
announcement.title: null
announcement.body:
Temporary Downtime for SIS TEST instance.

Banner Test (BTEST) will be unavailable starting at 9:30 AM on Thursday, Jan. 16th, so that Financial Aid and BOR/ITS modules may be installed.

announcement.title: You are currently viewing the test instance.

announcement.title: Spring 2020 Deadline for Registration/Schedule Changes is January 10th
announcement.body: Last day to register, make schedule changes, and/or drop without a "W" grade for Spring Semester 2020 is Friday, January 10th by 4:00pm Eastern Time. No changes to/from audit mode permitted after the registration deadline.
